## Objectives


At the end of the first part of this lesson, learners will:

1. Have a basic understanding of data manipulation with SQL; 

1. Be able to that understanding by writing short SQL queries;

1. Demonstrate the ability to save tabluar files in a variety of formats; and

1. Understand the reasons for saving files in different formats.


At the end of the second part of this lesson, learners will:

1. Explain the value of documentation; 

1. Demonstrate an understanding of components of documentation; and

1. Use R tools to build a data dictionary
